mapper.select: SELECT S2.* FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RNUM, S.* FROM (SELECT * FROM STADIUM ORDER BY STADIUM_INDEX DESC) S, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)TMP) S2 WHERE S2.RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow};

SELECT T2.*,COUNT(G.MEMBER_INDEX) AS PEOPLE FROM GAME G,(SELECT S.STADIUM_INDEX,S.STADIUM_NAME,S.STADIUM_PHOTO,S.STADIUM_ADDR,S.LATITUDE,S.HARDNESS,T1.TIME_INDEX,A.AREA_NAME,T1.TIME_PRICE,T1.TIME,T1.DATE FROM STADIUM S JOIN AREA A ON S.AREA_INDEX LIKE A.AREA_INDEX, (SELECT STADIUM_INDEX,TIME_INDEX,TIME_PRICE,TIME,D.DATE FROM TIME T,(SELECT DATE FROM DATE WHERE DATE LIKE '#{date}') D WHERE TIME = '#{time}') T1 WHERE S.STADIUM_INDEX LIKE T1.STADIUM_INDEX AND S.STADIUM_ADDR LIKE '%#{search}%') T2 WHERE G.TIME_INDEX LIKE T2.TIME_INDEX GROUP BY T2.TIME_INDEX;
